description: This is a Dart source file defining the RecommendationService class, which provides methods for generating book recommendations based on popularity and category overlap.

classes.name: RecommendationService
classes.description: Provides methods to retrieve popular books and recommend similar books based on category overlap.

methods.name: topPopular
methods.description: Returns the top N most popular books, defaulting to 6.

methods.name: similarByCategory
methods.description: Returns books similar to a seed book based on category overlap, sorted by combined score of category intersection and popularity.
